sentences.english: It was unveiled by Tokyo Electric Power Chairman Tsuneihisa Katsumata.
sentences.chinese: 东京电力公司总裁清水正孝宣布了这一计划。

sentences.english: Under the general circumstance, people of clear water town hardly get to S City.
sentences.chinese: 一般情况下，清水镇的人们很少到S市的。

sentences.english: Officials in Ming and Qing Dynasties were often sent to Qingshuijiang-Miao territory to collect timbers for royal palaces.
sentences.chinese: 明清两朝为修建皇宫到清水江“苗疆”征办“皇木”。

sentences.english: In addition, the water Masataka Fukushima and media will also be a brief meeting.
sentences.chinese: 此外，清水正孝还会在福岛与媒体做一个简短见面。

sentences.english: Shimizu is her bodyguard and will move in if there are problems.
sentences.chinese: 清水是她的保镖，一旦出现问题，便由他出面解决。

sentences.english: The astronauts' urine, incidentally, is recycled into clean water.
sentences.chinese: 顺便一提，宇航员的尿液会循环成清水。

sentences.english: Remove everything inside. Then wash the fish in clean water and rub salt into them.
sentences.chinese: 然后，在清水中清洗鱼，并将盐揉搓进鱼内。

sentences.english: Beyond Qingshuihe, the road turns into a mud fest.
sentences.chinese: 过了清水河之后，道路再一次成了乱泥节。

sentences.english: Isshiki Shimizu red brick, corner decorative patterns highlighted.
sentences.chinese: 一色清水红砖，墙角装饰花纹凸现。

sentences.english: To directly spray the stain with a few minutes, then rinse.
sentences.chinese: 将本品直接喷在污垢处，数分钟后，再用清水冲洗。

sentences.english: The scenery here has great charm, reminding one of the land of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 这里山清水秀，宛然桂林风光。

sentences.english: First of all, the air there is very good, with picturesque scenery.
sentences.chinese: 首先，因为那里的空气非常好，山清水秀。

sentences.english: Gradually add in water and mix with chopsticks until all the ingredients are well-blended and smooth.
sentences.chinese: 搅拌时，逐渐加入清水搅拌均匀成馅。

sentences.english: Rinse with clear water and wipe dry with clean cloth.
sentences.chinese: 以湿布加少量清水擦洗干净，再用清洁湿布抺净。

sentences.english: Usage: Apply some to the face, massage circularly until absorbed, and rinse by clean water.
sentences.chinese: 取适量本品于面部打圈按摩至吸收，用清水洗净即可。

sentences.english: If accidentally sprayed into eyes, immediately rinse with plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 若不慎喷入眼中，请立即用大量清水冲洗干净。
